alert.note: Alert for Ouray; San Juan; San Miguel (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 5:48PM MDT until August 13 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following counties, Ouray, San Juan and San Miguel. * WHEN...Until 730 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 547 PM MDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Black Bear Pass and Bridal Veil Road
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
